page.title: 18The Agricultural Engineer
page.content: {Mr Wheatcroft}is an{agricultural {engineer.}An{agricultural engineer is an{engineer}who repairs all the different types of{machinery}that is used on{farms.}It is a very important job in a farming area like Wentworth.{Mr. Wheatcroft}has been working in this business for{10 years and has someone who works with him.The man who works for him is married and has 3 children and he works 35_50 hours a week.He lives in Wentworth village. In his spare time he likes to go{deep sea diving.}To get to work he has a Land Rover. He sometimes works on Sundays and always works on Saturdays. He sometimes has to work very hard if an important bit of machinery breaks down. He enjoys his job and said that he liked because it gives him{job satifaction.}He owns a lot of machinery in his garage.
